layout.singingstanza: Oh, Lord, You are our Fa -- ther! We're the clay and You are the Pot -- ter! Oh, Lord, You are our Fa -- ther! We're the clay and You are the Pot -- ter! And all of us are the work of Your hand: I -- sai -- ah six -- ty -- four: eight. And all of us are the work of Your hand: I -- sai -- ah six -- ty -- four: eight.

lyrics.stanza: Oh, Lord, You are our Father! We're the clay and You are the Potter! Oh, Lord, You are our Father! We're the clay and You are the Potter! And all of us are the work of Your hand: Isaiah sixty-four:eight. And all of us are the work of Your hand: Isaiah sixty-four:eight.
